definition: to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: I consent to take any pre-employment physical examination required by the Company.
sentences.chinese: 本人愿意接受公司要求的职前体格检查。

sentences.english: Post-simulation shows that the deserializer meets the design requirements.
sentences.chinese: 后仿真结果表明，本文设计的串并转换电路满足要求。

sentences.english: The first thing he asked me was to help him get some dynamite, so that he could blow up Kim Jong Il.
sentences.chinese: 他对我提的第一个要求就是帮他搞到一些炸药。

sentences.english: The lawyers dissected his claim for damages.
sentences.chinese: 律师们仔细分析了他提出的赔偿要求。

sentences.english: Steven Kennard:What are the requirements for ABP choosing international partners?
sentences.chinese: 总部基地在全球选择合作伙伴都有哪些要求？

sentences.english: There are shelled the Preah Vihear Temple in the military demands of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 还有群众要求军方炮轰柏威夏寺。

sentences.english: This message contains a request to return a notification about your reception of the message.
sentences.chinese: 这封信要求回复信件处理通知给寄件者。

sentences.english: Note that the standard requires an empty line after the headers too.
sentences.chinese: 注意该标准同样要求在域头之后要有个空行。

sentences.english: Major non-conformities should require on-site verification within 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 严重不符合项应该要求在80天内完成现场验证工作。

sentences.english: The motion that the remark of the last speaker be expunged from the record.
sentences.chinese: 该提议要求把最后一个发言的人的讲话从记录上除掉。

sentences.english: Design of a switch, when to switch, the program re-entering the main requirement.
sentences.chinese: 设计一个开关，当进行切换后，程序再进入主要要求。

sentences.english: He had to hit the bullet and give into his boss's unreasonable demands.
sentences.chinese: 是他勉为其难，让步接受了老板的苛刻要求。

sentences.english: The foolish people were clamouring for war .
sentences.chinese: 愚昧的人叫嚣着要求打仗。

sentences.english: The hecklers were conducted away from the hall at the request of the Chairman.
sentences.chinese: 主席要求把捣蛋分子强行赶出大厅。

sentences.english: The juncture of 5) , plasterboard should ask to seam processing into andante by the design.
sentences.chinese: 石膏板的接缝应按设计要求进行板缝处理。

sentences.english: It introduces the motion requirement and the structural characters of yawing and variable pitch.
sentences.chinese: 简述了偏航和变桨距系统结构特点和动作要求。
